languages.text: "Мы покинем этот мир. Разве это не то, чего хотел{mf||а} ты, когда отказала моим собратьям в праве быть стражами Лилэтан?"

traits.locale_text: "Мы покинем этот мир. Разве это не то, чего хотел{mf||а} ты, когда отказала моим собратьям в праве быть стражами Лилэтан?"

languages.text: "We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my kin the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"
languages.original_text: "Мы покинем этот мир. Разве это не то, чего хотел{mf||а} ты, когда отказала моим собратьям в праве быть стражами Лилэтан?"

traits.locale_text: "We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my brethren the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"
"We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my brethren the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"
"We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my kin the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"
"We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my brethren the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"
"We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my kin the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"

languages.text: “我们会离开这个世界。你肯定很希望我们走人吧？因为你之前拒绝让我的族人成为莉莱赞的守护者。”
languages.original_text: "We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my kin the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: “我们会离开这个世界。你肯定很希望我们走人吧？因为你之前拒绝让我的族人成为莉莱赞的守护者。”

languages.text: «Abandonaremos este mundo. ¿No es eso lo que querías cuando negaste a mi gente el derecho a ser guardianes del Lilaethan?».
languages.original_text: "We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my kin the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: «Abandonaremos este mundo. ¿No es eso lo que querías cuando negaste a mi gente el derecho a ser guardianes del Lilaethan?».

languages.text: 「私達はこの世界を離れるつもりだ。同胞がリラエタンのガーディアンとなる権利を拒否した時点で、そうなることを望んでいるのだろう？」
languages.original_text: "We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my kin the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: 「私達はこの世界を離れるつもりだ。同胞がリラエタンのガーディアンとなる権利を拒否した時点で、そうなることを望んでいるのだろう？」

languages.text: "Wir werden diese Welt verlassen. War das nicht Euer Wunsch, als Ihr den Meinen das Recht verweigertet, die Wächter von Lileath zu sein?"
languages.original_text: "We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my kin the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden diese Welt verlassen. War das nicht Euer Wunsch, als Ihr den Meinen das Recht verweigertet, die Wächter von Lileath zu sein?"

languages.text: « Nous quitterons ce monde. N'était-ce pas là exactement ce que vous cherchiez à obtenir en nous refusant le droit d'être les gardiens de la lilaethan ? »
languages.original_text: "We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my kin the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous quitterons ce monde. N'était-ce pas là exactement ce que vous cherchiez à obtenir en nous refusant le droit d'être les gardiens de la lilaethan ? »

languages.text: "Bu dünyadan ayrılacağız. Soydaşlarımın Lilaethan'ı koruma hakkını reddettiğinde de istediğin şey bu değil miydi zaten?"
languages.original_text: "We will leave this world. Was this not your wish when you refused my kin the right to be the guardians of the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünyadan ayrılacağız. Soydaşlarımın Lilaethan'ı koruma hakkını reddettiğinde de istediğin şey bu değil miydi zaten?"
